# PIP_ID::HEADER
# Python dependencies for debt management assistant

# PIP_DEP::TRANSFORMERS
# Hugging Face Transformers for model support
transformers==4.35.0

# PIP_DEP::TORCH
# PyTorch (CPU version to keep image small)
torch==2.1.0 --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu

# PIP_DEP::UTILITIES
# Utility libraries
numpy==1.24.3
pyyaml==6.0.1
tqdm==4.66.1

# PIP_DEP::API
# API support
fastapi==0.104.1
uvicorn==0.23.2

# PIP_ID::FOOTER
# SchemaVersion: 1.0.0
# RequirementsID: debt-management-assistant
